sentences: With both the outgoing and incoming COP Presidents stressing that the climate change process is shifting from drafting to implementation, the lack of buzz in the halls of the Vigyan Bhawan seemed to confirm that the action is elsewhere.
Many conference participants remarked that this COP seemed as low-key as a meeting of the subsidiary bodies.
However, other observers said they were excited to meet a multitude of Southern NGOs that are not normally at COPs.
enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
